name: part time tarot
description:
part time tarot is a short twine experience for a game i want to develop in the future and flesh out more. in it, you start your first shift as a tarot reader at your local witchy shop. however, it's a slow day, and you're only able to read for the shopkeeper, who you flirt with.

you're able to get to know the owner more while reading for them during this demo / experimental tarot reading narrative game. 

using twine code, you can go back and explore different readings as well and start the game over within the same playthrough.

hope you enjoy !!!
